description: A warm salad recipe that is a perfect light snack for lunch or an appetiser
keywords: Vegetable bake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Baked Artichokes with Mozzarella & Basil Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 160g artichokes, store bought jar and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Place the drained artichokes on a baking tray and cover with the oil, balsamic, salt and pepper.
Roast in the oven for 15 minutes. Slice your mozzarella and wash/drain your basil leaves.
Remove the artichokes from the oven and serve layered with mozzarella, peppers and basil.
